<!--- Carbon Analysis ---> 
<h3> <a href="https://zac-driscoll.github.io/mmsd.carbon_analysis/"> 
Carbon Analysis</a> </h3>
<h4> Description:</h4>
This project seeks to identify redundancies in our carbon data. This analysis
was used to support a carbon plan in which the quantity of carbon samples
collected is reduced. 
<br>
<hr>
<!--- Oak Creek Site Selection Project ---> 
<h3> <a href="https://zac-driscoll.github.io/oc_analysis/index.html"> 
Oak Creek Site Selection</a> </h3>
<h4> Description:</h4>
This project seeks to identify redundancies between water quality 
monitoring sites on the Oak Creek. Based on the results of this analysis, 
one site will be dropped from the program.  A new site will be added to 
the program in 2022.<br>
<hr>
